= Details =

This project is a *Guice-adapted* version of [http://www.springsource.org/spring-data/jpa spring-data-jpa] with some improvements.
All reference documentation regarding to *spring-data-jpa* is
[http://static.springsource.org/spring-data/data-jpa/docs/current/reference/html/ here].

----
= Features =
 * Full support of [http://static.springsource.org/spring-data/data-jpa/docs/current/reference/html/#repositories.core-concepts 1.1-1.4], [http://static.springsource.org/spring-data/data-jpa/docs/current/reference/html/#jpa.query-methods 2.2-2.4] origial *spring-data-jpa* documentation parts
 * Support for batch store (see SimpleBatchStoreJpaRepository)
 * Allow access for EntityManager (see EntityManagerProvider)
 * Auto-binder possibilities - no need to do manual .bind() (see ScanningJpaRepositoryModule)
 * Significant test coverage
